Ordered this in the yellow/black print & it's been perfect for Fall wearing....I actually wore it when I hosted Thanksgiving & received tons of compliments and "where'd you get that?" questions... The fabric does require ironing when it comes out of my packed closet, but no biggie there.... What I love most is the style itself--the elasticized bodice, the square neckline & long sleeves (can be pushed up) plus the extra-wide, swingy legs make for a great look...Plus, there are so many patterns to choose from I just may buy again!
Super cute and looove the color, but it’s definitely on the shorter side.

Love this jumper. Comfortable. Looks pulled together. The fabric is lightweight. I ordered a darker color with small floral pattern. My undergarments were not visible. It came out of the package quite wrinkled. After a wash, it was still pretty wrinkled but nothing the steamer couldn't get out. I wore it to work and did notice it seemed to wrinkle easily but bc of of the pattern, it wasn’t obvious. The pockets are handy but because of the lightweight fabric, it was obvious I had my phone on me as it pulled down that side of the jumper. I read other reviews thinking it would be almost too long, but I’m 5’7” and it was perfect for flats. I don’t think I could do a very tall heel with this jumper.
Fit great.

Great great buy for fall in south very flowy, fall colors and is cool comfortable and material is great. I washed it has held up greatly. I am 5”5 athletic build ordered a large could have gotten a medium. But still looks GREAT!

This jumpsuit is very lightweight and soft. It is breathable and very comfortable to wear and is not see through. It is a one piece, long sleeve, jumpsuit. It also has wide leg pants with two side pockets. I got the pink patterned jumpsuit and it is gorgeous! I really love this jumpsuit for everyday wear and even for going out to dinner. It is very versatile and can be matched with a number of accessories.

Got this for my teen daughter who is a bit self conscious while also trying to find her style. This hit all the marks perfectly! It's comfortable and very breathable....does well even in hot weather. Worth the buy, love the fit, so comfy yet classy! Can dress up and down. True to size.

I'm 5'7" and while the legs are perfectly sized, the torso is a bit too short and makes me feel like I have to hunch over to avoid that dreaded "desert animal + metatarsal" issue. I'd say if you're 5'6" or under, this would be a great option!

I love this jumper. Super thin material, (the pattern made me a little nervous) the pattern is gorgeous! The back is a little lower than I usually like. Length is long, the elastic on the wrist is not to tight.

This jumpsuit is really cute. It's lightweight and flowy, perfect for spring/summer/fall months. It's stretchy in the chest, which helped it fit without being too constricting. I'm a size XL and I ordered a size XL - I would say that it runs true to size. The arms and legs fit me well. It has pockets! The only issue I had - if I pulled the chest up to where I wanted it, the crotch was riding a little high... if you have a longer torso you may want to be wary of how this will fit you. Overall, I still think I'll be able to wear it, but I just wish it would fit a little better!

You will not be disappointed with this cute, comfortable, and stylish jumpsuit!! It has been a long time since I have received so many compliments from men, women, strangers. Next time I will order a size smaller but it still looks good. The fabric is light weight for hot days, easy to bend and move as it moves with the body, and the value for the money is as expected. No complaints from me!!

Really cute and comfy ! Soft and seems like good quality fabric

This jumpsuit is adorable and fits wonderful! I don’t do jumpsuits very often because I’m short, but this is very flattering the way it fits and the sizing was perfect for me! I’m 5’3 I do have to wear wedges or platform sandals with it but overall it’s very nice quality and looks great!

This is a really pretty well-designed trendy flower vibe pants suit it. It’s a well fitted. Pant suit fits very well and very comfortable. It looks great, fits really well, and I got the size right on the first try, hooray! There's always that initial "packaging smell" when I receive items like these, but after two or three wash cycles - the smell is completely gone, and I'm overall happy with the outfit.

Absolutely adorable! The material is great quality and the fit is very flattering. I love that it's so comfortable too, so I can wear it all day without feeling restricted. I love it so much I want them in every color!
This one piece pants jumper is super comfortable. Has pockets on each side and the top is elastic. True to size and very fitting. Lightweight and thin.

评论概述: Fits perfect .Great for late summer and early fall .Love the fit

评论详情: I think it looks pretty off the shoulders, but with my height at 5’4 I almost feel boxy in it. Not to mention it smelled like a Halloween costume when I opened it.. it’s a plus to have pockets, but the fabric is not for me. I got a size small, and have a 25 in waist, 36 in bum, and wear a c/d in a bra for reference. I also don’t love the wrist bands.. and the sleeves were long for my arms. That’s why I placed it off shoulder and scrunched the sleeves, but the band is kind of irritating.
Perfect for business casual look.

Wow - I didn't really know what to expect for this jumpsuit but I was pleasantly surprised! I'm 5'6", 34D bust, 26" waist, long torso, and a size 2/4 for reference. I ordered the size S and it is true to size with the perfect length for my long torso! It looks adorable while on and the fabric is soft with a nice drape from the waist down. The smocked bust is flattering and this is a wide leg style. Looks exactly as depicted in the description pics and the print is lovelier in person. This is great for late Summer into Fall!
One piece that's very comfortable as long as sleeves around the chest waist area is stretching material the leg part is very flowy

My wife loves wearing the looser fit jumpsuits since they are so comfortable. This one is very nice too. It looks great on her and she said it is very breathable too. The print is beautiful. The sleeves and legs are loose  fitting. The material is 100% Viscose. It has elastic and is nice and stretchy. This makes her two jumpsuits like this, so she would recommend.

I really can't decide if this is trendy or just ugly. It came with a terrible smell out of the package which I'm sure can be aired out or washed away, so that doesn't bother me. It fits pretty well (its a jumpsuit- meant to be loose and the bodice is shirred meaning it stretches). I am 5'4" 120 lbs and the length is good with a wedge. Its... ok. I'm going to try again with my hair fixed and maybe with the right accessories and shoes and confidence it will look amazing, Unsure. Certainly is comfortable.

评论概述: Comfort and style, silky, made for the tall
评论详情: From my wife - Comfort with style - This outfit is easy to get up and comfortable to wear.  The fabric is silky and the color with it’s pattern is nice to look at.  I feel “dressed up” when I put this on.  Note - this is made for taller people which I already figured out before I purchased it.  I am hemming it to match my height.  This is not unusual since I barely reach 5 feet.

I got this in XL. 36/30/40 measurements, so I was on the fence between large and XL. The waist and hips fit well in XL, but the top is just a smidge loose. It is lower cut on the front and back, so careful choice of undergarments is needed.  The pockets are a decent size, but a bit small for holding a larger phone or wallet without being noticeable.  I'm 5'4", and the length is a bit long; an inch or two in the heel will be needed.  Overall, it's cute. The green is a nice vibrant color, and the pattern breaks it up and adds some interest. The cut is flattering and the material does not cling. I think this is a winner.

I have worn three or 4 times already! Fit is very good. I do wear a belt at the waist with this. Well made and a definite must for summer! Extremely easy to get on and off you just step into it and pull it up!👍🏾👍🏾👍🏾

I ordered the "Pink" color and it is just as pictured, a pink background with purple accents.  The jumpsuit fits true to size and is super comfortable.  It is lightweight and has loose legs for an airy feel.  The fabric is not heavy so it is perfect for summer evening wear.  Such a cute boho look!

I think this romper is adorable and so well made. I ordered the brown and it is very pretty. It's hard to tell in the photos, but the tiny flowers are an aqua color.  The material is very soft and seems like it will be great to wear in the Spring and summer months and the bonus is that this has pockets! I love how "flowy" the pants are as well.  Really cute product!

This is one of the best jumpsuit for casual occasions. I have a plus size but this one fits so well and the fall of material is perfect that helps me looking thin comparatively.  Fabric is super comfortable, I will surely buy another one.
Wore it for Thanksgiving - very flattering top and flowy pants. Fabric is lovely, great quality for the money. Comfortable and classy!
Well made. Great fit. Beautiful neck line. I'll definitely order again
Love this fits perfect , just go ahead and order your size !
